page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT continued
page.content: We asked children to find out why their parents did the jobs. Lizzie's mum works at Mr. Hollands farm and she likes it because it is in the open air and her friends work their. Kirsty's mum works at the Angel pub in Woodbridge. She works very late sometimes but she likes it because she always comes out happy. Her dad works at White House Farm, Dallinghoo. He is the Farm Manager and looks after all the animals. He leaves at 7.30a.m. and returns at 4.30p.m. He likes it because he comes bouncing down the road with a smile on his face every day.
